title: help needed on failing code on go 1.6.1 but was passing on go 1.4.2
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
```
go version go1.6.1 linux/amd64
```

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
```
GOARCH="amd64"
GOBIN=""
GOEXE=""
GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
GOHOSTOS="linux"
GOOS="linux"
GOPATH="/go"
GORACE=""
GOROOT="/usr/local/go"
GOTOOLDIR="/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/linux_amd64"
GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT="1"
CC="gcc"
GOGCCFLAGS="-fPIC -m64 -pthread -fmessage-length=0"
CXX="g++"
CGO_ENABLED="1"
```

3. What did you do?
This code was green on go 1.4.2
https://travis-ci.org/buger/gor/builds/92756998

but now it's failing on go 1.6.1 https://travis-ci.org/buger/gor/builds/123705073

4. What did you expect to see?
https://travis-ci.org/buger/gor/builds/92756998

5. What did you see instead?

https://travis-ci.org/buger/gor/builds/123705073

Any help is appreciated

Thanks
